text: Mustafa Güven Karahan (1943 – 2 September 2013) is a Turkish politician. He served as the Minister of Health 1999. Karahan graduated from Istanbul University's Cerrahpaşa Medical Faculty. He completed his thesis at Hacettepe University's Faculty of Medicine. He worked as the Urology department of the Bandırma State Hospital. He served as the deputy of Balıkesir in the 20th and 21st terms. Karahan was married and had two children. == References == Category:1943 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Democratic Left Party (Turkey) politicians Category:Istanbul University Cerrahpaşa Faculty of Medicine alumni Category:Health ministers of Turkey Category:People from Kastamonu Category:Members of the 20th Parliament of Turkey Category:Members of the 21st Parliament of Turkey Category:Members of the 56th government of Turkey
title: Mustafa Güven Karahan
